discourse_list.title: Thursday 9pm CEST Endgame DVC meeting: Launch Clustering and Transition

content.content: Todays Decentralized Voter Committee Meeting will be about Part 7 of the Endgame Plan: Launch Clustering and Transition. Following the post of Endgame Plan Part 5 which described the Pregame and Early Game Products in detail Endgame Plan Part 5: Endgame Product Roadmap - Pregame and Early Game which contain all of the technical requirement for launching the Endgame Plan and following up with powerful features post-launch This DVC Meeting will focus on the more humans aspects, including workforce and administrative aspects, such as budgets, and the process of clustering and aligning teams to the different Launch MetaDAOs that will result in the greatest value created, with the least disruption to the overall transition efforts. This includes a preview of the broad scopes of existing clustering efforts I’m aware of in the ecosystem to date, which should facilitate a better understanding of the value proposition of the Launch MetaDAO tokens Call link:   Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...
content.GPT-summary: The post is about the Decentralized Voter Committee Meeting that will focus on the Launch Clustering and Transition of the Endgame Plan. The author explains the technical requirements for launching the Endgame Plan and the focus of the meeting on the human aspects, including workforce and administrative aspects. The post also provides a preview of the existing clustering efforts in the ecosystem. The post does not contain any advertising or entirely positive/negative feedback on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
